track.name: Justify My Thug
comments: Hoping, Praying. For you. To justify my love.
Madonna and RUN DMC sampled magnificent beat ftw. Jay is great here too.

"Mr. President, there's drugs in our residence
Tell me what you want me to do, come break bread with us
Mr. Governor, I swear there's a cover up
Every other corner there's a liquor store - fuck is up?"
i am the michael schumacher of this roc roster, travellin mach 5, barrelin, my power can stop god

i love the beat...anyone know if this is a dj quik original? 

got samples from Justify my love from Madonna and Rock Box from RUN DMC on it.  The chorus on this song really sucks big dick
i love the beat...anyone know if this is a dj quik original?
